amendment.description: Amendment adds to the water research outcomes a study of competing water supply uses and how different uses interact with and impact each other.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in House Report 111-82 to require the plan to include improvement of understanding of competing water supply uses and how different uses interact with and impact each other.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Arcuri amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.
